name: Cattle Muster Master
description:
Cattle Muster Master is a simple cattle mustering simulation game.

Game objective is to gather as much cattle as possible into the enclosure using two farmers holding a rope. using arrow an WSAD keys.

Beat your own score or share the keyboard to play in a co-op mode.

Good luck!

Authors
  • Rowper - game design and programming
  • IndieForger - programming and project management
  • Coel - 3d modelling
